cgcloud__Account_Plan_Category__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Plan_Category__c
cgcloud__Account_Plan_Category__c.description: Categories of the account plan including the manual inputs. Categories can be assigned to an account plan. A category can only be assigned to one account/business year combination.

cgcloud__Manual_Calculation_Input_2__c.description: Contains the manual inputs for the account and categories in the JSON format.

cgcloud__Manual_Calculation_Input_3__c.description: Contains the manual inputs for the account and categories in the JSON format.

cgcloud__Manual_Calculation_Input__c.description: Contains the manual inputs for the account and categories in the JSON format.

cgcloud__Uniqueness_Check__c.description: Combination of AccountPlan.Account, AccountPlan.BusinessYear, and Category to check for uniqueness.

cgcloud__Version__c.description: Refers to the version number, which is updated every time the record is edited.
